lead_paragraph: A Delaware bankruptcy judge will hold a hearing Thursday on a request by Trump Entertainment Resorts to be relieved of its pension obligations under a collective bargaining agreement with workers at the Taj Mahal casino.

headline.main: Judge Eyes Trump Entertainment Pension Obligations
headline.print_headline: Judge Eyes Trump Entertainment Pension Obligations

snippet: A Delaware bankruptcy judge will hold a hearing Thursday on a request by Trump Entertainment Resorts to be relieved of its pension obligations under a collective bargaining agreement with workers at the Taj Mahal casino....
